collection:
**Data Processing and Storage**

3.1 Files Processing: The Plugin processes user files to provide assistance
and suggestions.

By using the Plugin, you authorize us to access and process
the contents of your file.

By using
the Plugin, you consent to our collection, use, and sharing of your data as
described therein.

Unless you cancel your subscription before the
end of the current subscription period, it will automatically renew, and you
authorize us to collect the applicable monthly fee using any payment method we
have on file for you.
